name: Little Smith (ChirvingsDev)
description:
Little Smith is the beginning of my career as an indie developer, I'm passionate about creating videogames, I've loved the very little I've been working on with this project, I'm not the best at drawing or programming but I keep learning day by day and I promise to take this project to its final facet to launch it everywhere where possible

What I bring you here is a very small sample of what I have planned for this project, which depends on the support, it will come out sooner, it is planned to come out this year

Things to come or in development:

-Character progression system

-New tools

-Enemies

-And in the future, a system of clients to who we can sell equipment from what we get by mining or fighting

If the project catches your attention, you can write to me and follow me on twitter @ItsChirvings

I would appreciate all the comments, they are well received

Any financial support would also be appreciated, it would be very helpful
